ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Update a Ruleset
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Update a Ruleset
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Update a Ruleset.
Rulesets allow you to route events to an endpoint and create collections of Event Rules, which define sets of actions to take based on event content.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#rulesets)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Update a Ruleset

Update a Ruleset. Rulesets allow you to route events to an endpoint and create collections of Event Rules, which define sets of actions to take based on event content. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#rulesets)

Method: Put

OperationID: updateRuleset

EndPoint:

/rulesets/{id}
